This has resulted in an opportunity for Deloitte Tax LLP (Deloitte Tax) to provide even greater value through our tax services, in helping develop tax departments of the future that are strategic, agile and, above all, focused on creating value for the business.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Verdana> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Verdana>Deloitte Tax's Tax Management Consulting (TMC) group helps our clients’ tax department move forward from their current state to the next-generation of tax functions, and is dedicated to finding new methods and processes to assist clients in improving their tax operations. Deloitte Tax TMC professionals are aligned worldwide to serve our clients’ needs through the TMC group. Deloitte Tax TMC teams include industry, tax, organizational change, technology, and co-sourcing specialists who can help make the necessary connections between our clients’ global strategies and the many options for carrying them out in the tax function.</FONT></DIV><DIV><B><U><FONT size=2 face=Verdana> </FONT></U></B></DIV><DIV><B><U><FONT size=2 face=Verdana>TMC, Tax Data Management & Analytics (TDMA)</FONT></U></B></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Verdana>Deloitte Tax LLP’s National Tax Management Consulting (TMC), Tax Data Management & Analytics (TDMA) practice offers a full solution of tax-based process and technology services (including product implementations) to enhance a corporate tax department’s ability to deliver value-added contributions to its organizations. The scope of services includes the design and implementation of multiple advanced analytics technology and data management solutions utilizing OBIEE, OBIA, Oracle Tax Analytics, Hadoop, Big Data, Exalytics, Endeca, Exadata, STAR schema based data modeling and mobility solutions to integrate our process, third party solution sets, and technology services targeting corporate tax departments.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Verdana> </FONT></DIV><DIV><B><U><FONT size=2 face=Verdana>Tax Data Analytics (TDA), Senior Consultant</FONT></U></B></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 {"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30db1"},"category":"Management Consulting","city":"Chicago","description":"<FONT color=#000000><FONT face=\"Times New Roman\"></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><SPAN style=\"mso-no-proof: yes\"><FONT face='\"arial\",sans-serif'>Deloitte Consulting LLP</FONT></SPAN><FONT face='\"arial\",sans-serif'> seeks <SPAN style=\"mso-no-proof: yes\">a Consultant, Technology, Analytics & Information Management, Information Delivery</SPAN> in <SPAN style=\"mso-no-proof: yes\">Chicago, IL and various unanticipated Deloitte office locations and client sites nationally</SPAN>.</FONT></P><FONT face=\"Times New Roman\"></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 1.5in; mso-layout-grid-align: none\"><SPAN style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: bold\"><FONT color=#000000><FONT face='\"arial\",sans-serif'> </FONT></FONT></SPAN></P><FONT face=\"Times New Roman\"></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><STRONG style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><FONT face='\"arial\",sans-serif'>Work You’ll Do</FONT></STRONG></P><FONT face=\"Times New Roman\"></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 1.5in; mso-layout-grid-align: none\"><SPAN style=\"mso-no-proof: yes; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold\"><FONT color=#000000><FONT face='\"arial\",sans-serif'>Function as integrator between business needs and technology solutions. Help create technology solutions to meet clients' business needs. Gain exposure to multiple industries and service lines within the practice while demonstrating an awareness of the full breadth of services offered by engagement follow-up opportunities. Define systems strategy; develop system requirements; design, prototype, and test custom technology solutions; and support system implementation. Within a team, design and test technical specifications for ETL processes using Informatica Powercenter. With assistance, perform gap and logical data models analysis, run data migrations, deploy application builds, and execute performance testing using Informatica Powercenter, CA Erwin Data Modeler, Oracle, IBM Cognos BI and Autosys. Help design database queries, triggers, procedures, functions, and packages for reporting and data analytics using Oracle. Assist with the development of code scripts using Unix Shell and Perl language. Translate business requirements into technical requirements using Informatica Powercenter, IBM Cognos BI, Oracle, Unix Shell Scripting, and Autosys. With guidance, design data modeling and data mart solutions for enterprise DWs using CA Erwin Data Modeler.</FONT></FONT></SPAN></P><FONT face=\"Times New Roman\"></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; This has resulted in an opportunity for Deloitte Tax LLP (Deloitte Tax) to provide even greater value through our tax services, in helping develop tax departments of the future that are strategic, agile and, above all, focused on creating value for the business.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Verdana> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Verdana>Deloitte Tax's Tax Management Consulting (TMC) group helps our clients’ tax departments move forward from their current state to the next-generation of tax functions, and is dedicated to finding new methods and processes to assist clients in improving their tax operations. Deloitte Tax TMC teams include industry, tax, organizational change, technology, and co-sourcing specialists who can help make the necessary connections between our clients’ global strategies and the many options for carrying them out in the tax function.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><B><U><FONT size=2 face=Verdana>TMC, Tax Data Management & Analytics (TDMA)</FONT></U></B></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Verdana>Deloitte Tax LLP’s National Tax Management Consulting (TMC), Tax Data Management & Analytics (TDMA) practice offers a full solution of tax-based process and technology services (including product implementations) to enhance a corporate tax department’s ability to deliver value-added contributions to its organization. The scope of services includes the design and implementation of multiple advanced analytics technology and data management solutions utilizing OBIEE, OBIA, Oracle Tax Analytics, Hadoop, Big Data, Exalytics, Endeca, Exadata, STAR schema based data modeling and mobility solutions to integrate our process, third party solution sets, and technology services targeting corporate tax departments.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Verdana> </FONT></DIV><DIV><B><U><FONT size=2 face=Verdana>Senior Manager, Tax Data Analytics</FONT></U></B></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Verdana>As a <B>Senior Manager, Tax Data Analytics</B> you will be responsible for, among other things, the day-to-day management and delivery of the technical aspects of our Oracle (BI) Business Intelligence solutions and technology consultation projects to TDMA clients. Primary responsibilities include leading functional teams in the development and technical implementation of Oracle analytics solutions, as well as providing technical expertise and project management of process and data management solutions utilizing workflow, document management, data collection, and portal capabilities. You will work with Partners and Directors to design and deliver these services to our clients, as well as lead and mentor Managers, Seniors and Staff in this group. You will also assist in the standardization of certain internal processes utilizing Oracle BI. Other responsibilities will include providing Oracle BI subject matter expertise and project leadership for analysis, review, and selection of third-party applications for use in our overall analytics solution space, as well as serving as a liaison between TDMA and team members from Deloitte Consulting LLP. The position will be focused on supporting client projects and pursuits, solution development, and practice development activities. The consulting practice is built around integrated core capabilities</FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial>- people, process and technology and industry expertise - the capabilities needed to help clients to tackle their most complex  challenges.</FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial> </FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial><STRONG>Strategy </STRONG><STRONG>& Operations</STRONG></FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial>Executable strategy requires fusing insightful thinking with disciplined execution to achieve breakthrough performance. Today, senior executives grapple with attaining profitable growth, strategically managing costs and intelligently navigating risk. Such challenges require more than identifying new possibilities and making tough choices. They also require bridging the gap between vision and execution </FONT><A href=\"http://www.deloitte.com/view/en_US/us/Insights/Browse-by-Content-Type/Case- Studies/Strategy-Operations-Case-Studies/index.htm\"><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial>http://www.deloitte.com/view/en_US/us/Insights/Browse-by-Content-Type/Case- Studies/Strategy-Operations-Case-Studies/index.htm</FONT></A></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial> </FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial>Our Strategy and Operations teams bring deep industry experience, </FONT><A href=\"http://www.deloitte.com/view/en_US/us/Industries/index.htm\"><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial>http://www.deloitte.com/view/en_US/us/Industries/index.htm</FONT></A><FONT face=Arial>, rigorous analytical capabilities and a pragmatic mindset to our clients'  most complex  business problems. Our strategy capabilities span corporate and business unit strategy, M&A strategy, and sales and marketing. Our operational capabilities reflect the unique issues facing manufacturing organizations, service businesses and infrastructure operations. These are joined with capabilities in finance, performance management and business restructuring.</FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial> </FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial>Our professionals are aligned with an S&O service line to promote the development of deep functional skills & experiences and to maximize our ability to tailor solutions to solve our clients' business issues.  Our Strategy & Operations service lines include:</FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial></FONT> </P><UL><LI><FONT face=Arial>Monitor Deloitte Strategy</FONT> <LI><FONT face=Arial>Finance</FONT> <LI><FONT face=Arial>Mergers & Acquisitions </FONT><LI><FONT face=Arial>Service Operations</FONT> <LI><FONT face=Arial>Supply Chain & Manufacturing Operations</FONT> <LI><FONT face=Arial>Business Model Transformation</FONT> <LI><FONT face=Arial>General Management</FONT><FONT face=Arial> </FONT></LI></UL><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial></FONT> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial><BR>Business Model Transformation: BMT services help drive the business and operating model changes required to achieve an organization’s strategic vision. This includes everything from architecting the future state operating model to designing and leading a transition program to put the model in place – because even the leading business model is only as good as its implementation.</FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial></FONT> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Life Sciences & Health Care</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Deloitte Consulting's Life Sciences and Health Care Service practice consists of our health provider clinical transformation/clinical information systems and revenue cycle services which are designed to assist our clients shape the evolution of the industry. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">We deliver our broad range of services through an integrated, collaborative approach between our practitioners, clients and alliances.  We have built our practice around practitioners with significant years of industry experience as well as broad range of comprehensive solutions that are designed specifically to address the complex operating and technology challenges of the health care industry.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Life Sciences</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Many Life Sciences organizations are faced with the promise of great discoveries and the challenges of market fluctuations and increasing regulation. Our healthcare professionals serve a distinct group of clients that are involved in the discovery, development, manufacturing and sale of pharmaceuticals, biotechnology and medical devices.  Deloitte Consulting can help clients respond to market forces and maximize their possibilities by addressing these and other challenges in today's complex environment.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"> </P><br><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Sr. Manager:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Senior Managers are expected to contribute to the firm's growth and development in a variety of ways, including: </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Engagement Management: Lead engagement planning and budgeting; mobilize and manage engagement teams; define deliverable structure and content; facilitate buy-in of proposed solutions from top management levels at the client; direct on-time, quality delivery of work products; manage engagement economics; manage engagement risk</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Client Management: Manage day to day interactions with executive clients and sponsors</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Business Development: Develop and maintain contact with top decision makers at key clients; organize and lead pursuit teams; participate and lead aspects of the proposal development process; contribute to the development of proposal pricing strategies</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Practice Development &amp; Eminence: Develop practical solutions and methodologies; develop \"thoughtware\" and \"point-of-view\" documents; participate in public speaking events; get published in industry periodicals</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">People Development: Perform role of counselor and coach; provide input and guidance into the staffing process; actively participate in staff recruitment and retention activities; provide leadership and support for delivery teams and staff in local offices</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">A minimum of 8 years consulting and/or industry experience is required.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">A Bachelor's Degree is required.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Ability to travel 100% required.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">In addition, successful Senior Managers will also have the following preferred skills:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Ability to work independently, manage small engagements or parts of large engagements.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Strong oral and written communication skills, including presentation skills (MS Visio, MS PowerPoint).</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills with the ability to exercise mature judgment.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Willingness to mentor junior staff.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">An advanced degree is preferred.</P><br><p>Deloitte is one of the leading professional services organizations in the United States, specializing in audit, tax, consulting, and financial advisory services with clients in more than 20 industries. We provide powerful business solutions to some of the world’s most well-known and respected companies, including more than 75 percent of the Fortune 100.</p><p>At Deloitte, you can have a rewarding career on every level. In addition to challenging and meaningful work, you’ll have the chance to give back to your community, make a positive impact on the environment, participate in a range of diversity and inclusion initiatives, and find the support, coaching, and training it takes to advance your career. Our commitment to individual choice lets you customize aspects of your career path, your educational opportunities and your benefits. The role provides you the opportunity to sharpen your technical, analytical and business skills while working as a part of a team committed to delivering excellent service for clients around the globe. You will learn new skills that are in demand by our clients, gain expertise in Deloitte’s methodologies and contribute to increasingly complex duties.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P><P class=MsoNormal style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><SPAN style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: \"Arial\", sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: \"Times New Roman\"'> <o:p></o:p></SPAN></P><P class=MsoNormal style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><SPAN style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: \"Arial\", sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: \"Times New Roman\"'>In conjunction with our other delivery centers around the world, we offer development and sustainment services for our clients, both pre and post-implementation. Our continued growth has created the need for application development and management professionals to provide services in support of our client’s systems and business processes. Successful candidates will demonstrate both their ability to work independently and experience making decisions to complete assigned responsibilities from center leadership. We are seeking exceptional candidates who have the commitment to join a world-class client delivery organization that is a part of one of the world's premier consulting firms.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P><P class=MsoNormal style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><SPAN style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: \"Arial\", sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: \"Times New Roman\"'> <o:p></o:p></SPAN></P><P class=MsoNormal style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><SPAN style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: \"Arial\", sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: \"Times New Roman\"'>We strive to be recognized as the leading professional services firm by demanding and delivering excellence, and by providing interesting, challenging work and opportunities for personal and professional growth. Come and excel within Deloitte Consulting. Our delivery centers provide complete operations services for application management, custom development, and business process support for clients. Our teams develop post implementation go-live support environments, construct the transition plan from the project team to the support team, and support and maintain the client applications and technology infrastructure.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P><P class=MsoNormal style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><SPAN style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: \"Arial\", sans-serif; We provide powerful business solutions to some of the world’s most well-known and respected companies, including more than 75 percent of the Fortune 100.</p><p>At Deloitte, you can have a rewarding career on every level. In addition to challenging and meaningful work, you’ll have the chance to give back to your community, make a positive impact on the environment, participate in a range of diversity and inclusion initiatives, and find the support, coaching, and training it takes to advance your career. {"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30dcd"},"category":"Management Consulting","city":"Los Angeles","description":"<P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial>Deloitte Consulting LLP is one of the world's leading management consulting firms for executable strategy, operations, technology, and human capital advisory services. The consulting practice is built around integrated core capabilities</FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial>- people, process and technology and industry expertise - the capabilities needed to help clients to tackle their most complex  challenges.</FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial> </FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial><STRONG>Strategy </STRONG><STRONG>& Operations</STRONG></FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial>Executable strategy requires fusing insightful thinking with disciplined execution to achieve breakthrough performance. Today, senior executives grapple with attaining profitable growth, strategically managing costs and intelligently navigating risk. Such challenges require more than identifying new possibilities and making tough choices. They also require bridging the gap between vision and execution </FONT><A href=\"http://www.deloitte.com/view/en_US/us/Insights/Browse-by-Content-Type/Case- Studies/Strategy-Operations-Case-Studies/index.htm\"><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial>http://www.deloitte.com/view/en_US/us/Insights/Browse-by-Content-Type/Case- Studies/Strategy-Operations-Case-Studies/index.htm</FONT></A></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial> </FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial>Our Strategy and Operations teams bring deep industry experience, </FONT><A href=\"http://www.deloitte.com/view/en_US/us/Industries/index.htm\"><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial>http://www.deloitte.com/view/en_US/us/Industries/index.htm</FONT></A><FONT face=Arial>, rigorous analytical capabilities and a pragmatic mindset to our clients'  most complex  business problems. Our strategy capabilities span corporate and business unit strategy, M&A strategy, and sales and marketing. Our operational capabilities reflect the unique issues facing manufacturing organizations, service businesses and infrastructure operations. These are joined with capabilities in finance, performance management and business restructuring.</FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial> </FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial>Our professionals are aligned with an S&O service line to promote the development of deep functional skills & experiences and to maximize our ability to tailor solutions to solve our clients' business issues.  Our Strategy & Operations service lines include:</FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial></FONT></P><UL><LI><FONT face=Arial>Monitor Deloitte Strategy</FONT> <LI><FONT face=Arial>Finance</FONT> <LI><FONT face=Arial>Mergers & Acquisitions </FONT><LI><FONT face=Arial>Service Operations</FONT> <LI><FONT face=Arial>Supply Chain & Manufacturing Operations</FONT> <LI><FONT face=Arial>Business Model Transformation</FONT> <LI><FONT face=Arial>General Management</FONT><FONT face=Arial> </FONT></LI></UL><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial></FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial><BR>Business Model Transformation: BMT services help drive the business and operating model changes required to achieve an organization’s strategic vision. This includes everything from architecting the future state operating model to designing and leading a transition program to put the model in place – because even the leading business model is only as good as its implementation.</FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><FONT face=Arial></FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Life Sciences & Health Care</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Deloitte Consulting's Life Sciences and Health Care Service practice consists of our health provider clinical transformation/clinical information systems and revenue cycle services which are designed to assist our clients shape the evolution of the industry. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">We deliver our broad range of services through an integrated, collaborative approach between our practitioners, clients and alliances.  We have built our practice around practitioners with significant years of industry experience as well as broad range of comprehensive solutions that are designed specifically to address the complex operating and technology challenges of the health care industry.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Life Sciences</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Many Life Sciences organizations are faced with the promise of great discoveries and the challenges of market fluctuations and increasing regulation. Our healthcare professionals serve a distinct group of clients that are involved in the discovery, development, manufacturing and sale of pharmaceuticals, biotechnology and medical devices.  Deloitte Consulting can help clients respond to market forces and maximize their possibilities by addressing these and other challenges in today's complex environment.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"> </P><br><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Manager:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Managers will lead and deliver large, complex client engagements that identify, design, and implement creative business and technology solutions for large companies.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Manager level responsibilities include: providing service excellence by identifying key client business issues, determining client needs by supplementing the standard assessment techniques and tools with innovative approaches, evaluating and validating analysis and developing recommendations for the client in the context of the overall engagement.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Managers implement and oversee the quality of deliverables and effectively manage the team and day-to-day relationships to ensure exceptional performance.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Managers participate in the development and presentation of proposals for business development activities.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Managers can lead small engagements or components of large, complex engagements.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- A minimum of 6 years consulting and/or industry experience is required.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- A Bachelor's Degree is required.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Strong oral and written communication skills, including presentation skills (MS Visio, MS PowerPoint).</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills with the ability to exercise mature judgment.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; Execute and operationalize development programs and processes.  Provide functional area expertise to identify, research and resolve complex problems.</FONT><FONT color=black>  </FONT><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><B><U><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Unique Business Situation</FONT></U></B><U><FONT size=2 face=Arial>: </FONT></U></DIV><UL><LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Due to the regulatory requirements and oversight of the PCAOB, members of the Audit Learning team are often asked to respond to multiple, random, urgent requests re: curriculum content, delivery logistics and timing, and in process development.  As such, it is critical that development specialists can effectively cope with change and shift gears comfortably. </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV></LI><LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>As the Audit Talent Development Learning Team is newer in its tenure, there are still many undefined and inconsistent processes for managing various aspects of development and delivery. As a result, it is critical that development specialists are comfortable aligning communication, people, culture, processes, resources and systems to ensure effective implementation and delivery of required results.</FONT></DIV></LI><LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Our Audit Talent Development Learning Team works primarily and almost exclusively in a virtual environment.  As such, it is critical that development specialists are able to allocate their own time efficiently, handle multiple demands and competing priorities on their own with, at times, little direct supervision from others, manage meetings effectively over the phone, and recognize and demonstrate engagement and support for their team by actively participating on calls, raising questions and sharing their opinions appropriately.</FONT></DIV></LI><LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>This role will be client-facing with the Audit Practice ~85% of the time and thus the following foundational stakeholder management skills are critical to being successful:</FONT></DIV></LI><UL><LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Adaptable communication skills: tailoring one’s style appropriately to different audience needs and preferences</FONT></DIV></LI><LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>High level of responsiveness (ability to manage daily email requests and respond with status within 24 hours of receipt)</FONT></DIV></LI><LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Business writing skills: can write succinctly, but with impact.  Knows what context is relevant and what is considered as ‘noise’ to the reader.</FONT></DIV></LI><LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Strong project management skills, including: building and monitoring work-plans, knowing what to prioritize and why, knowing who to keep informed, why, and how often, knowing when to escalate. </FONT></DIV></LI><LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Can deal comfortably with more senior managers; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">• Pricing & Profitability Management</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Health Plans<BR> <BR>Health Plans face a number of unique environmental pressures that affect the way they will conduct business today and in the future - among them a need for increased privacy and security, an intense focus on risk management, access to capital, efforts to consolidate and streamline IT functions, the launch of new consumer-driven business models, managing chronic diseases through medical management practices, maximizing e-business-driven platforms, implementing health plan-specific customer relationship management tools and complying with increasing financial and transactional legislation. MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Managers will lead and deliver large, complex client engagements that identify, design, and implement creative business and technology solutions for large companies.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Managers implement and oversee the quality of deliverables and effectively manage the team and day-to-day relationships to ensure exceptional performance.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; Our healthcare professionals can help clients address these and other challenges in today's complex health care environment.<BR> <BR>Government Programs<BR>We are seeking candidates who have consulting experience as it relates to Medicaid, Medicare Advantage, and Medicare Part D.<BR> <BR>PBM<BR>We are seeking candidates who have consulting experience relating to third party administrator of prescription drug programs, pharmacy, administration of claims and benefits, drug utilization, distribution, disease management, and volume purchasing.<BR> <BR>Clinical<BR>We are seeking candidates who have consulting experience as it relates to payor disease and utilization management, HIN, ICD10 business processes, technology assessment, planning, remediation and compliance.<BR> <BR>Core Administer Delivery / Program Management<BR>We are seeking candidates with consulting experience involving cost containment, process improvement, provider contracting, project management and Health Care Reform.<BR> <BR>Product Development<BR>We are seeking candidates with consulting experience within health plans for market assessments and sizing competitive intelligence, sales management and distribution, network development, and vertical integration.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Engagement Management: Lead engagement planning&nbsp; and budgeting; mobilize and manage engagement teams; define deliverable structure and content; facilitate buy-in of proposed solutions from top management levels at the client; direct on-time,&nbsp; quality delivery of work products; manage engagement economics; manage engagement risk</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- Client Management:&nbsp; Manage day to day interactions with executive clients and sponsors</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; develop \"thoughtware\" and \"point- of-view\" documents; participate in public speaking events; get published in industry periodicals</P><P style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">- People Development: Perform role of counselor and coach; The role provides you the opportunity to sharpen your technical, analytical and business skills while working as a part of a team committed to delivering excellent service for clients around the globe. You will learn new skills that are in demand by our clients, gain expertise in Deloitte’s methodologies and contribute to increasingly complex duties. <br><br>In conjunction with our other delivery centers around the world, we offer development and sustainment services for our clients, both pre and post-implementation. Our continued growth has created the need for application development and management professionals to provide services in support of our client’s systems and business processes. Successful candidates will demonstrate both their ability to work independently and experience making decisions to complete assigned responsibilities from center leadership. We are seeking exceptional candidates who have the commitment to join a world-class client delivery organization that is a part of one of the world's premier consulting firms. <br><br>We strive to be recognized as the leading professional services firm by demanding and delivering excellence, and by providing interesting, challenging work and opportunities for personal and professional growth. Come and excel within Deloitte Consulting. Our delivery centers provide complete operations services for application management, custom development, and business process support for clients. Our teams develop post implementation go-live support environments, construct the transition plan from the project team to the support team, and support and maintain the client applications and technology infrastructure. <br><br><b>Illustrative responsibilities include:</b> </p><ul><li><div style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Responsible for supporting and independently completing project tasks</div></li><li><div style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Identifies key drivers of a defined, straightforward problem and proposing solutions </div></li><li><div style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Identifies and solves problems using analysis, experience, and decision making </div></li><li><div style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Selects the most relevant tools/techniques to meet specific client requirements </div></li><li><div style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Understands the benefits of using state of the art methods and tools and their application on a particular engagement; contributes to continuous development of methods and tools </div></li><li><div style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Manages work to work plans for components on engagements </div></li><li><div style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">May independently own a work stream, reviewing, and potentially directing the work of more junior staff </div></li><li><div style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Develops solutions to client problems through application of methods and tools; validates solutions to subject matter experts </div></li><li><div style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Demonstrates accountability and contributions to the successful realization of client goals </div></li></ul><p style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">If you are interested in a position, please contact us. To qualify for our Solution Engineer role, you should possess the following: <br></p><p style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\"><br></p><p style=\"MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px\">Deloitte Consulting LLP is seeking a talented Business Analysts to join our project team to provide life sciences commercial data management services for our clients. This candidate will be a Business Analyst for the implementation of a new application. They will assist in the full life cycle of development including:<br></p><ul><li><font size=\"3\">Working with the end users in requirement gathering and initial scoping of projects</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">Preparing business requirements document</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">Coordinating with the technical development team assist with clarifying questions</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">Facilitate and perform system testing and user acceptance testing process.&nbsp;</font></li></ul>Not only will candidates be joining a project team, they will be joining a team of resources dedicated to delivering client engagements from an off-site location focused on common tools, technologies, and methodologies.<br><br><b>Position Requirements:</b><br><ul><li><font size=\"3\">Bachelor’s degree or equivalent years experience required</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">3-5 years experience in working with the clients and driving requirement discussions</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">Prior experience with life sciences industry is an added plus</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">Must be willing to live and work in the Parsippanny, NJ area</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">Must be willing to travel up to 30% on an annual basis</font></li></ul><b>Preferred:</b> <br><ul><li><font size=\"3\">Experience with Life Sciences commercial data</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">Superior analytical and problem-solving skills&nbsp;</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">Effective interpersonal and communication skills&nbsp;</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">Demonstrated leadership and team-building abilities&nbsp;</font></li><li><font size=\"3\">Creativity, self-confidence, and flexibility</font></li></ul><br><p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px\"></p><br><p>Deloitte is one of the leading professional services organizations in the United States, specializing in audit, tax, consulting, and financial advisory services with clients in more than 20 industries. Manages invoicing internal control processes by coordinating invoice review and approval involving Project Controller, Contracts Management team, Project Management team and project Partner/Principle/Director (PPD). Explores solutions to meet the needs of the client according to policies and guidelines. Responsible for ensuring all activities are performed in a timely manner for all client requests. Specializes in a specific Federal client segment, contract type, client billing system, or Deloitte financial system.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT face=Arial> </FONT> <BR>Illustrative Duties and Responsibilities</DIV><DIV> </DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Understands and interprets contract brief and contract documentation, including master contract agreements (IDIQ, BPA and GSA schedules) and subcontract agreements to obtain contract type, invoicing requirement details, labor category requirements, fee caps and withholds, invoicing terms and conditions and applicable Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) clauses. In addition, reviews task order documentation to identify contract value, funding, CLIN/SLIN/ACRN structure, invoice submission specifications and other pertinent information.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Works with multiple contract types, including cost reimbursable, time and material (T&M), firm fixed price and related variations of each.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Understands and follows Deloitte policy, Federal Practice invoicing compliance policy, FAR, Joint Travel Regulations (JTR) and other contract or subcontract requirements.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Analyzes costs posted to projects to ascertain allowability and billability. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Reconciles expense charges and reviews documentation, including subcontractor hours and expenses.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Compiles invoice backup documentation to comply with client invoice specifications and Deloitte internal records.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Prepares invoices for Federal clients, adhering to standardized billing processes, reviewing, understanding, and interpreting billing parameters and billing terms and conditions stated in the contracts and subcontracts. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Ability to validate billing system invoice calculation and application of caps, fees, indirect rates and decrements as needed.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Creates invoice in the accounting and billing system and submits invoice to the client per contractual terms and conditions. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Accesses client online invoicing systems, as appropriate, to upload invoices and perform invoice related research (funding limitations, contract modifications, payment detail, etc.), as needed.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Prepares Book to Bill reconciliation for each invoice to include direct and indirect GL transactions and indirect rate reconciliation.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Reconciles invoice attributes and calculation of indirect and direct rate true-ups to Deloitte fiscal year Incurred Cost Submissions (ICS) and approved DCAA provisional billing rates for cost reimbursable and reimbursable expense invoices.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Maintains accurate records of billing calculations and records, including contracts and modifications, invoice supporting documentation, email approvals, indirect rate true-ups, overpayments, invoice cancellations and related items.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Coordinates with Project Controller, Contracts Management team, Project Management team and PPD, in accordance with the Deloitte Billing Procedure internal controls, to obtain invoice approvals and respond to client inquiries.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Updates an invoice tracking database on a daily basis for assigned project portfolio and provides deferred and unbilled transaction balance information to project management no less than once every accounting period.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Resolves complex invoicing issues that arise due to unique billing requirements, project adjustments or system issues.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Specializes in a specific Federal client segment, contract type, client billing system, or Deloitte financial system.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Assists in implementing processes and procedures that will improve efficiency and strengthen internal controls.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Responds timely to external and internal audits and data calls, including compiling supporting documentation.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Performs other job-related duties as assigned.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><DIV><STRONG>Required </STRONG></DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Bachelor’s Degree  </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">3 to 5 years of relevant Federal client/contracting experience in an accounting process, such as invoicing, general accounting, finance, account reconciliations and analysis </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Experience with online invoicing systems such as WAWF, IPP, MPO, HHMSA, etc. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Experience working in virtual teams </P></DIV><DIV>2 years of current use of Deltek Costpoint experience <BR>2 years of current use of Cognos Reporting </DIV><DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; {"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30def"},"category":"Tax","city":"Boston","description":"<P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Deloitte Tax</STRONG><BR>Deloitte Tax LLP helps companies understand national, state and local, and international tax structures and align the tax function with business objectives.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">As an employee of Deloitte Tax, you will work with colleagues worldwide to serve our clients. As you advance in your career, most Deloitte Tax professionals specialize in at least one industry and one group of service offerings. Full-time Deloitte Tax team members will be a part of our mobile workforce which may require travel for extended engagement in another city and/or participating as part of team aligned with another Deloitte Tax service line and/or another Deloitte function-specific subsidiary.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Internship Program</STRONG></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The Deloitte Tax LLP summer internship provides an introduction to tax.  Throughout the program, participants will focus on issues shaping and affecting the profession today as well as topics related to their own career development. Counseling is another aspect of the Internship Program.  At the end of each engagement, interns will have the opportunity to review their performance with management.  Additionally, staff will serve as \"counselors\" to this year's intern group.  Counselors serve as a vital source of information and advice as well as participating in many of the social activities planned for the interns throughout their internship.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Deloitte Tax offers a variety of Service Lines including:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Business Tax Services</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax's Business Tax Services (BTS) professionals understand the intricacies of tax regulations and their relationships to business. In many cases, BTS professionals manage the day-to-day client service relationships-and as such, these professionals serve as the gateway to a variety of specialized Deloitte tax services that can help improve compliance with taxing entities while maintaining each client's overall tax risk profile. Knowledgeable in Federal Tax compliance and planning, BTS professionals work closely with clients and other members of the Deloitte Tax team to understand each organization's global goals and strategies and how industry and economic trends affect the business</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Global Employer Services</STRONG> — Global Employer Services tax professionals help clients develop tax-aligned compensation and benefits programs that address their global and domestic needs. Professionals are comprised of global compensation, benefits, and international assignments practitioners who work with clients to streamline their programs while managing tax effectiveness, risks, and costs. These services are designed to assist clients with developing the strategies, processes, and technologies that affect their staff and operations on a worldwide scale</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>International Tax</STRONG> — Within the area of international tax, the goal of any organization should be to align global effective tax rate reduction and efficient global cash utilization with overall business strategy.  Professionals in the international tax practice help multinational clients integrate tax planning into their overall business strategy and comply with both US and international regulatory requirements. Whether a company is engaged in a merger or acquisition, maintaining compliance with multi-jurisdictional business transactions, or streamlining multi-national supply chain, Deloitte Tax's international tax professionals concentrate efforts on international compliance, research, consulting and planning issues.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Mergers & Acquisitions</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax Merger & Acquisition (M&A) professionals provide corporate and private equity buyers with a broad continuum of advisory services to support mergers, acquisitions, carve-outs, investment and financing structures, disposition alternatives and post-transaction activities.  Working with clients before, during and after the transaction, tax professionals work with clients across corporate functions such as finance, treasury, human resources, operations, information technology and risk management to analyze and evaluate the tax profile and to implement planning designed to help meet each organization's global goals, strategies and business objectives.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Multistate Tax</STRONG> — Multistate taxation is more complex and demanding than ever before. Not only do states and local tax areas have their own unique tax laws, but authorities are more focused on enforcement.  As seasoned professionals in all aspect of multistate tax, Deloitte Tax multistate practitioners help clients manage their state and local tax liability through thorough end-to-end tax approaches, wide-ranging industry and government experience, and deep client commitment.<BR><BR> <BR><BR></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><br><UL><LI><DIV class=BSubheading-Green style=\"PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 0pt 0.25in; mso-pagination: widow-orphan lines-together\"><SPAN style=\"FONT-WEIGHT: normal; In addition to challenging and meaningful work, you’ll have the chance to give back to your community, make a positive impact on the environment, participate in a range of diversity and inclusion initiatives, and get the support, coaching, and training it takes to advance your career. Our commitment to individual choice lets you customize everything from your career path to your educational opportunities to your benefits. And our culture of innovation means your ideas on how to improve our business and your clients’ will be heard.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Visit <A title=www.deloitte.com/us/careers href=\"http://www.deloitte.com/us/careers\"><FONT color=#0000ff>www.deloitte.com/us/careers</FONT></A> to learn more about our culture, benefits, and opportunities.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Deloitte Transactions and Business Analytics LLP (DTBA) advises clients on managing business controversy and conflict, executing deals, and maintaining regulatory compliance. We provide services to companies throughout their lifecycle from purchasing a company to investigating potential fraud.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>                                </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>We help clients address serious business concerns across a range of corporate activities, such as completing transactions and strategic investments, investigating and deterring potential fraud, managing the litigation process, and preparing for reorganization. <BR><BR>Our work in these areas has earned us recognition as leader among advisory firms. In fact, Kennedy Consulting Research & Advisory ranked Deloitte #1 globally in Forensics and Dispute Advisory Services in 2013, and Deloitte was named a 2013 Kennedy Vanguard Leader in both Forensic & Investigative Services and Dispute Advisory & Analysis Services based on breadth and depth of capabilities. <BR><BR>DTBA Analytics is a fast-growth practice within Deloitte FAS that centers around several of the hottest areas of business today – analytics, forensic analysis, and litigation support – and the specialized skills that make careers in these areas both fascinating and in high-demand. Our Analytics team makes extensive use of data, statistical and quantitative analysis, rules-based methods, and explanatory and predictive modeling to bring insights to client issues in the forensic and transaction domains. We work with Deloitte specialists in many areas, and we apply our solutions to a wide range of highly interesting and complex corporate events, such as forensic investigations, anti-corruption compliance, restructuring, valuation, anti-money laundering compliance, and construction management, to explain what has occurred in the past and to support informed decision making for the future. Our work increasingly employs specialized competencies, such as advanced analytics, visualization, and geospatial techniques. <BR><BR>DTBA Analytics is composed of two Service Areas, which share similar approaches, but offer different experiences and skillsets: <BR><BR><B>Data Analytics:</B></FONT></DIV><UL type=disc><LI><B><I><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Data Analytics: </FONT></I></B><FONT size=2 face=Arial>This involves strategic analysis of structured (e.g. transactional) and unstructured (e.g. text) electronic data, from initial data scoping and collection through transformation and validation, for purposes of deep data analysis and mining. This analysis is performed as the basis for larger efforts that include rules- and indicator-based testing, inductive reasoning, and visualization techniques. These methods are used to identify, deter, and prevent fraud schemes and scenarios, develop models that depict or describe historical events, and build predictive models for future anti-fraud and anti-corruption efforts. Analytical methods are also commonly used to mine and develop insights into large volumes of data to help navigate intricate legal processes and identify areas of opportunity for business process improvement. Additionally, analytics is often used to assist troubled companies in peer analysis, quantifying opportunity cost, and discerning areas of strategic improvement. </FONT></LI><LI><B><I><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Application Development</FONT></I></B><I><FONT size=2 face=Arial>: </FONT></I><FONT size=2 face=Arial>From standalone tools to enterprise web applications, we leverage a modern proprietary services-based development platform and agile methodology to assist clients with processing data, presenting findings, and documenting decisions. We serve both external clients and internal clients with a focus on enhancing existing FAS products and service offerings</FONT></LI></UL><DIV><B><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Advanced Analytics:</FONT></B></DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV><B><I><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Advanced Analytics:</FONT></I></B><I><FONT size=2 face=Arial> We use advanced analytic techniques, such as rules, anomaly detection, regression, data mining algorithms, and link analysis, to develop models that classify or predict potential outcomes.  We apply these approaches to help organizations discover, detect, investigate, and prevent fraud and other financial crimes at an enterprise-level. These methods leverage specialized tools and technologies, including SPSS, SAS, and SAP.</FONT></I></DIV><UL type=disc><LI><B><I><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Economic and Statistical Consulting</FONT></I></B><FONT size=2 face=Arial>: We apply advanced economic, finance, and quantitative techniques to address complex business and legal challenges, creating strategies and providing expert testimony for government agencies, leading law firms, and corporations. These techniques include development of economic and statistical models and the application of state-of-the-art analytical tools to uncover patterns and correlations in complex data to help predict likely future outcomes. </FONT></LI><LI><B><I><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Geospatial Consulting</FONT></I></B><FONT size=2 face=Arial>: We analyze geographic data, using a combination of spatial software and analytical methods, to assist clients in making strategic decisions, reducing risks, increasing efficiency, and realizing organization goals. </FONT></LI><LI><B><I><FONT size=2 face=Arial>FAS Analytics Institute (FAI):</FONT></I></B><FONT size=2 face=Arial> This is a team of analytics experts from industry and academia, dedicated to researching and developing FAS’ advanced analytics capabilities in text, visual, predictive, and geospatial analytics. The FAI develops advanced analytics techniques and approaches that lead to enhancement of existing FAS products and services or the creation of new FAS products and services.</FONT></LI></UL><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>In addition, DTBA Analytics professionals are positioned to team with and provide leadership and guidance to broader Deloitte-wide analytics initiatives and global opportunities. Our practitioners have the opportunity to stay current on the latest analytics tools and techniques, as well as industry and regulatory-specific developments. From a career development standpoint, we offer unparalleled opportunities for personal and professional development afforded by our client base, engagement volume, global exposure, and mentoring programs. In addition to on-the-job training, Data Analytics offers live, in-person, and virtual learning opportunities, external development courses, a four-week boot camp program for campus hires, and an in-person national DTBA Analytics meeting for all practitioners. <BR><BR>Examples of areas in which DTBA Analytics has delivered value to clients include: </FONT></DIV><UL type=disc><LI><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Implementing an advanced tax fraud system to help uncover hidden relationships (e.g., organized fraud rings), pinpoint suspicious tax-return patterns, prioritize and effectively assign fraud cases, and provide insight into historical behavioral information that can recognize repeat offenders. </FONT></LI><LI><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Enhancing the integrity of financial systems by facilitating the detection and deterrence of financial crime. </FONT></LI><LI><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Preventing immigration benefits from being granted to individuals who pose a threat to national security or public safety or who seek to defraud the immigration system. </FONT></LI><LI><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Enabling an energy and resources client to proactively detect and prevent fraud and corruption within their third party supplier and procurement process. </FONT></LI><LI><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Enhancing a transaction-monitoring program for a financial services client by assisting them in the development and implementation of a methodology to analyze, test, and tune various money laundering and terrorist financing detection scenarios. </FONT></LI><LI><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Delivering an analytics solution that created a predictive coding model to assist a financial services client with identifying and categorizing an enormous volume of privileged and non- privileged documents related to a large bankruptcy case. </FONT></LI><LI><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Helping to resolve a royalty distribution dispute in the client's favor by developing and articulating an economic model that showed how to determine the relative market value of the copyrighted content.</FONT></LI></UL><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Our dedicated Deloitte FAS professionals bring vast experience, specialized skill sets and deep industry knowledge to our clients. This personalized level of service, combined with the market reach and technical resources of the Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited (DTTL) member firms and their affiliates, enables us to respond to the complex and diverse needs of our clients around the world.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial><BR><B>Role Description</B></FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Managers are professionals with a strong record of academic and professional achievement who have the capacity and desire for continuous development and growth.  Deloitte professionals must be capable of working and communicating with people at all levels of an organization. </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>As a Manager, you will be asked to provide leadership in a variety of challenging roles, make significant contributions in a relatively short time frame, take responsibility for the way you manage your time, develop your skill set, and deliver innovative solutions to the client.  Your career success is dependent on your ability to personalize your career path and identify and grow your internal and external network. Additionally, you will be noted for your ability to grow the careers of others in your capacity as a mentor to junior staff members. We don’t expect you to do this alone - our environment provides multiple opportunities for you to further develop your skills through our training curriculum and mentoring programs.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><B><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Manager Responsibilities</FONT></B></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Deloitte managers typically work with a project team dedicated to taking direction from a Senior Manager or Principal/Partner/Director.  They work side by side with the P/P/D often with exposure to executives, organizational leaders and their legal counsel. Project teams either work onsite with the client team or from a Deloitte office. Either location may necessitate regular travel and requires flexibility with the significant travel requirements of client service projects.</FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Managers lead multiple project work streams, small engagement teams or components of large, complex engagements.  They mentor junior practitioners, guiding them as they conduct detailed data analysis for developing meaningful insights to address regulatory and business challenges across industries.  </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial> </FONT></DIV><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Arial>Engagements include a wide variety of solutions, tailored to the {"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30e09"},"category":"Risk Management","city":"Arlington","description":"<DIV>Deloitte is one of the leading professional services organizations in the United States specializing in audit, tax, consulting, and financial advisory services with clients in more than 20 industries. We provide powerful business solutions to some of the world's most well-known and respected companies, including more than 75 percent of the Fortune 100.</DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV>At Deloitte, you can have a rewarding career on every level. In addition to challenging and meaningful work, you'll have the chance to give back to your community, make a positive impact on the environment, participate in a range of diversity and inclusion initiatives, and get the support, coaching, and training it takes to advance your career. Our commitment to individual choice lets you customize everything from your career path to your educational opportunities to your benefits. And our culture of innovation means your ideas on how to improve our business and your clients' will be heard.</DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV>Visit www.deloitte.com/us/careers to learn more about our culture, benefits, and opportunities.</DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV>Title:  Assistant Facility Security Officer (AFSO)</DIV><DIV>Location:  Arlington, VA</DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">General Description:  </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">General Description:  Deloitte is seeking an experienced Facility Security Officer-trained professional to directly support our Director of Federal Security/FSO and implement and administer the daily National Industrial Security Program (NISP) operations, procedures and controls to safeguard classified contract and (when necessary) special program information, as well as integrate across all of Deloitte's Federal Security Management mission areas:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCI) and Special Access Program management and operations;  </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• NISP classified contracts and program operations under the governance of the NISP Operating Manual (NISPOM); and</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI) security requirements embedded in our federal contracts, related to federal client-designated CUI/sensitive information and personnel security program requirements. .</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">AFSO Duties:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Manage and conduct NISP operations and supervise associated personnel affiliated with both Department of Defense/NISP User Agencies’ contracts/clients as well as Intelligence Community programs/clients that span an \"access elsewhere\" operational environment to in-house safeguarding of classified/program information and materials (to include classified proposal development support). </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Ensure compliance with DOD/Federal/Intelligence Community regulations that govern the critical security disciplines of both NISP/NISPOM and SCI classified contract-related security support.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Maintain cognizance and oversight of all NISP-affiliated classified contracts, providing risk evaluations upon contract award in coordination with Federal Contracts and other Enabling Areas; ensuring  </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Define personnel security program requirements for implementation by Deloitte Federal Security Shared Services/ Personnel Security Operations Center. As needed, administer and support the personnel security products/processes associated with NISPOM collateral clearances, Special Access processing, and SCI accesses, to include required oversight of security training, debriefings, employee termination briefings, and facilitate required badging procedures (both client-related and internal to Deloitte for classified area access).</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Develop and, as needed, deliver required NISP security awareness training courses for all cleared Deloitte professionals.  Provide advisory and consultation to Federal leadership, senior management, project managers, engagement team members, and mentor members of the Federal Security team.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Conduct administrative inquiries for security violations and conduct the requisite investigations and interviews related to compromises/ potential compromises of classified information.  Fully document and analyze findings for review by Federal Security leadership, ensuring all violations or reportable incidents are thoroughly evaluated and eventually reported, when required, to the appropriate cognizant security agency. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Conduct security-related liaison activities with external (client) customers/Government security officials,  internal (Deloitte) Federal leadership, and Enabling Areas (Federal Contracts, Recruiting, Talent, Facilities, Office of Security & Safety, Information Technology Services (ITS), Federal Operations,  as well as the Chief Confidentiality Office(r), Risk Management and Office of General Counsel.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Perform other related duties required to assure a comprehensive and viable security program within the guidelines of the NISPOM as well as Deloitte's overall Federal Security Program.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Coordinate as needed with the Deloitte FSOs, other AFSOs, CSSO/PSO offices.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Act as the daily operational manager for the FSO and provide back-up to the FSO, when necessary.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Duties (Detailed):</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Review, coordinate, publish (and amend, as needed) security program governance documentation e.g., policies, procedures, Standard Practice Procedures (SPP) manuals, Technology Control Plans, Systems Security Plans.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Support the FSO with maintenance of FCL documentation in ISFD, e-FCL.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• On a continuing basis, review and analyze the overall security status of the various security programs and provide recommendations for corrective actions, to include conducting formal self-inspections and define and monitor continuous evaluation criteria (as part of self-inspection program).</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• (In concert with Shared Services PerSec Operations Center) Manage Personnel Security Clearance processing per defined processes and procedures. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">o Process outgoing visit authorizations for personnel assigned to the Directorate who are visiting other agencies</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">o Validate the personnel security clearance of new personnel.  If required, initiate action for the proper investigation to be conducted.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">o Defined, update, maintain and produce reports from Federal Security database and JPAS (Joint Personnel Adjudication System) database.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Administer Security Education/Training to Cleared Personnel </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">o Administer a security education and awareness program so as to indoctrinate new personnel, advise personnel of the adverse effects to national security that could result from unauthorized disclosure, and of their personal, moral, and legal responsibility to protect classified information within their knowledge, possession, or control; Physical Security, ISS, OPSEC, and COMSEC.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">o Conduct briefing/debriefing of individuals requiring access as required.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">o Maintain an ongoing security education program, e.g., design updates to annual online training, publish security awareness notices, design and participate in Security Awareness venues.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">o Aid in development and dissemination of an effective Insider Threat, Threat Awareness and OPSEC program (required for Protection of Sensitive but Unclassified Information and Protection)</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">o Advise personnel of their reporting requirements, both personal/administrative and compliance/incident-related reports.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">o Conduct Derivative Classification training, as needed.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Review RFPs and RFIs in support of our client service proposal/capture activities and provide summary (or detailed, when required) written responses to the proposal/engagement teams regarding to security requirements and any risk factors identified.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Review classified contracts and associated classification guidance (DD 254 and narrative language within the contract) on newly-awarded contracts and advise contract/client-service teams on security risks related to their performance.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Prepare DD 254 documentation and appropriate security guidance for subcontractors</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Prepare Facility Clearance (FCL) Sponsorship documentation for subcontractors requiring new FCLs.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Receive, control, route, store, mark, package, mail and destroy all classified material, and maintain applicable records thereto.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Provide guidance on the proper marking techniques for classified documentation and media.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Provide proper packaging and marking guidance for all classified material being transported via mail carrier to other agencies or Industry Partners.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Provide training/demonstrate use of security-related equipment e.g., shredders, STEs, electronic security access systems/intrusion detection devices. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Ensure implementation of sound physical security and access controls/safeguarding procedures for areas that store classified material, e.g., access/visitor control; combinations on locks used to secure classified information are changed per regulatory guidance.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P></DIV><br><DIV><DIV><DIV><STRONG>Position-specific Required Skills:</STRONG></DIV><DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Position-Specific/Required Skills:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;A minimum of 3 years technical program management experience as an AFSO or FSO in the NISP.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;Associate's degree coupled with 3-5 years of work experience.&nbsp; [Bachelor’s degree preferred].&nbsp; </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;Strong working knowledge of National Industrial Security Program Operating Manual (NISPOM), DOD personnel and information security regulations, information systems security program requirements, Director Central Intelligence Directives (DCIDs), and other related Federal security laws, directives and regulations.&nbsp; [Knowledge of DoD and Federal Agencies' controlled unclassified information (CUI)/sensitive information security requirements, preferred.]&nbsp; </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;Completion of FSO certification-related courses and training. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;Expert knowledge of Joint Personnel Adjudication System (JPAS), e-FCL, ISFD.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;Effective presentation and public speaking skills and experience; demonstrated development and delivery of training programs (tailored to specific client needs) is essential.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;Effective written communication skills, able to span interactions with all levels of professionals within the organization (new hires, program teams, and Deloitte leadership).</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;U.S. Citizenship and active Top Secret clearance required. [Current SCI access/eligibility preferred.] </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Position-Specific/Desired Skills:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;Bachelor’s Degree, Advanced Degree with Security Specialization, ISP® Certification.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;Experience in physical and facilities security program management to include accreditation policies and processes associated with both NISP secured areas and SCIF environments.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;3+ years of experience working in a team environment that is rapid-response, customer-focused and results-driven. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">•&nbsp;TS/SCI clearance.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Work Location:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The primary work location is Arlington, Virginia (either Rosslyn or Arlington Federal office), with occasional travel to local area offices within NOVA/DC/MD for security meetings, backup support for security programs in other Deloitte locations, and internal/external client meetings.&nbsp; There may be some opportunity for travel to other Deloitte (U.S.) locations outside of the GWDC area, but current plans are intermittent.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P></DIV></DIV></DIV><br><p>Deloitte is one of the leading professional services organizations in the United States, specializing in audit, tax, consulting, and financial advisory services with clients in more than 20 industries.
