{"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30e10"},"category":"Risk Management","city":"Arlington","description":"<DIV>Deloitte is one of the leading professional services organizations in the United States specializing in audit, tax, consulting, and financial advisory services with clients in more than 20 industries. We provide powerful business solutions to some of the world's most well-known and respected companies, including more than 75 percent of the Fortune 100.</DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV>At Deloitte, you can have a rewarding career on every level. In addition to challenging and meaningful work, you'll have the chance to give back to your community, make a positive impact on the environment, participate in a range of diversity and inclusion initiatives, and get the support, coaching, and training it takes to advance your career. Our commitment to individual choice lets you customize everything from your career path to your educational opportunities to your benefits. And our culture of innovation means your ideas on how to improve our business and your clients' will be heard.</DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV>Visit www.deloitte.com/us/careers to learn more about our culture, benefits, and opportunities.</DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV> Position Description: Security System Administrator (Manager Federal Security – Information Systems)</DIV><DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Logistics: </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Primary work site is in Chantilly, VA with occasional travel to Arlington, VA for support and security, team and internal client meetings.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The candidate will be a member of the Federal Security Management (FedSec) team with primary responsibilities for all aspects of classified systems administration including applications, databases, and telecommunications.  Additionally includes designing, implementing, configuring, coordinating, controlling, maintaining, troubleshooting, securing, continuous monitoring of usage and developing specialized system security processes procedures. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The System Administrator also performs basic systems security administration functions, i.e. creating user accounts; monitoring and managing system resources, log files, CPU and disk usage, performing backups,  performing systems backup and recovery procedures; hardware/software inventory; writing or modifying basic scripts to resolve performance problems; maintaining system documentation and logs; performing or assisting in troubleshooting problems; maintaining  network security including application security; anti-virus, user authentication; and keeping abreast with current security technologies, applicable laws and regulations in support of Intelligence Community (IC) clients located in a Sensitive Compartmented Information Facility (SCIF).</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The candidate will join a team of professionals with primary responsibility for locations in Chantilly and Arlington, VA while providing additional backup and surge support for locations in the Washington D.C. metropolitan area.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Security System Administrator</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Definition: The Security System Administrator is responsible for the day-to-day operations and maintenance of the Firm’s automated information systems with an additional responsibility to provide support during Assessment and Authorization activities.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Security System Administrator candidate requirements:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">1. US citizenship</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">2. TS/SCI clearance</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">3. Polygraph required</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">4. Primary Work location, Chantilly, VA</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Responsibilities of the Security System Administrator include:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">1. Performing day-to-day Local Area Network systems administration. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">2. Responsible for full lifecycle systems infrastructure, to include systems design – systems implementation/Full Operational Capability.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">3. Defining and implementing local system and operational policies and procedures in coordination and with concurrence of the ISSO/ISSM.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">4. Establishing system specifications by conferring with users; analyzing workflow, access, information, and security requirements</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">5. Maintaining system performance by providing system monitoring, analysis and performance tuning; troubleshooting system hardware, software, networks and operations systems.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">6. Securing systems by developing system access, monitoring, control, and evaluation; establishing and testing disaster recovery policies and procedures; maintaining back-ups and documentation.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">7. Preparing users by designing and conducting onboarding training programs; providing references and support.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">8. Responsible for providing current desktop and server patch management, security updates addressing Information Assurance Vulnerability Alerts (IAVAs), overall security posture, including Microsoft and Cisco critical software updates/releases.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">9. Assist with installation and setup of new hardware, including desktops, servers, and networking equipment.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">10. Monitors, analyzes, troubleshoots, and/or evaluates hardware, software and other network related problems, provide technical expertise for performance and/or configuration of the networks and systems. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">11. Coordinates with all responsible users and stakeholders to resolve network or system incidents. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">12. Incident response: collaborates internally and externally to develop and support operational procedures to mitigate risks related to classified data spills, intrusions and unauthorized accesses within Federal compliance guidelines relative to specific Federal agency clients to maintain system integrity and availability.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">13. Strong verbal and written skills required providing management status reports and document system changes</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Additional Duty Responsibility: Security Assessment and Authorization (A&A) resource:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">1. Ensuring systems security requirements of applicable policies and directives are implemented and enforced</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">2. Performing on-going risk analysis</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">3. Developing Assessment and Authorization (A&A) Body of Evidence, to include Security Concept and Assumptions, defining scope of System Boundary and Perimeter, determining relevant Interconnected Information Systems, Generic Threats, Protection Levels (PL) / Impact Levels (IL) and Levels of Concern (LOC)</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">4. Define Security Controls Traceability Matrix (SCTM), Security Assessment Reports (SAR), and System Security Plan (SSP), Security Architecture and Risk Management Matrix, as needed</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">5. Ensure technical security features and assurances are specified to support Confidentiality, Integrity, and Availability</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">6. Conducting Self-Assessment documentation, testing and archiving</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">7. Making appropriate accreditation recommendations</P></DIV><br><DIV><DIV><DIV><STRONG>Required Skills:</STRONG></DIV><DIV>&nbsp;</DIV><DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">1.&nbsp;Strong technical knowledge of security system functions, security policies, technical security safeguards, and operational security measures to include government security requirements with NISPOM, ICD 503 and DCID 6/3</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">2.&nbsp;8 years of experience in a network/software/hardware support and/or systems administrator role</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">3.&nbsp;4 years of experience with Assessment and Authorization and supporting a client within the Federal Intelligence Community</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Position-specific Desired Skills:</STRONG></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG></STRONG>&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">1.&nbsp;Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP). Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP) with emphasis in Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist (MCTS) in Windows Server 2008 R2 and Windows Exchange Server 2008</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">2.&nbsp;Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer (MCSE) would be desirable as well</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">3.&nbsp;Network infrastructure to include experience with routers and/or switches</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">4.&nbsp;Virtualization technologies, such as VMware, Citrix XenServer, or Microsoft Virtual Server/Hyper-V</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">5.&nbsp;Have expert technical knowledge of security system controls, policies, technical security safeguards, and operational security measures to include various government security requirements and working knowledge of NISPOM, NIST, DCID 6/3, ICD 503 and JAFAN 6/3</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">6.&nbsp;Knowledge and experience of Federal Information Systems Assessment and Authorization requirements, processes and procedures related to the Intelligence Community</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">7.&nbsp;Familiarization and understanding and/or training with National Institute for Standardization and Technology (NIST) Special Publication 800 Series</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">8.&nbsp;Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent combination of education and experience (four years) in security AIS field; developing and implementing security programs for multiple agencies in an SCI/DoD environment</P></DIV><DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">&nbsp;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P></DIV></DIV></DIV><br><p>Deloitte is one of the leading professional services organizations in the United States, specializing in audit, tax, consulting, and financial advisory services with clients in more than 20 industries. MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">This is an experienced personnel security professional role within the Federal Security Management Office (FedSec) Shared Services Center.  The position offers an opportunity to design and perfect the National Industrial Security Program (NISP) and Public Trust suitability personnel procedures, as well as the Intelligence Community / Special Program access procedures, within a Shared Services environment.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The position will involve applying knowledge of – and integrating – National Industrial Security Program (NISP) personnel security clearance regulatory requirements; Special Access Program/Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCI) access processing and requirements, as well as understanding and implementation of Public Trust suitability/fitness processing.  </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The position will require a mature, developed regulatory knowledge of the NISPOM (NISP Operating Manual), DCID/ICD (Director of Central Intelligence/Intelligence Community Directives), and agency-specific Public Trust suitability program requirements to ensure Deloitte’s compliance with:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">1) National Industrial Security Program Operating Manual (NISPOM) requirements; </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">2) Intelligence Community Security Programs:  DCID & ICDD regulatory compliance;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">3) Other government agencies’ personnel security policies related to Public Trust suitability and fitness investigations in support of Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI). </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">This role will also seek to ensure the successful integration and coordination of the federal security personnel security mission and activities with the Deloitte Firms’ broader security policies and procedures.  </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> The primary responsibilities of this Position are to:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Provide timely, accurate, and courteous processing of PerSec actions required through-out the personnel security lifecycle; </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Act as a mentor to other more junior team members to train on the business processes and the policy requirements, underpinning those processes; </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Share the responsibility for managing workload to achieve even distribution and most efficient case processing times;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Acting in support of the Personnel Security Shared Services Center Lead as needed; </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Contributing to the evaluation, design, and refinement of security-related business processes;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Developing and reporting of metrics;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Reviewing and maintaining current products and development of new products to improve overall Federal Security mission performance, in coordination with client needs/requirements;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Developing and maintaining personnel security policies, documenting security procedures, and developing/delivering security education materials to meet specific compliance requirements – both contract-related, professional customer service needs, and client-service/business support imperatives;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; maintaining updated personnel security and suitability records; and, maintaining accurate and up-to-date records within Access Commander (AC); </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Fingerprinting of employees in process for investigations;</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">• Act as the quality control specialist for personnel security paperwork, ensuring all packages are properly completed and ensuring any required/associated documentation is included. These professionals perform assessments, remediation, implementation and integration of end-to-end solutions in these three areas.  They also deliver advisory services focused on risk and compliance to IT management and senior executives for both external audit and internal audit clients.  TR professionals focus on information systems and technology that manage risk and/or drive operational, financial and regulatory compliance processes; as well as solutions that manage the risk associated with information technology itself.</FONT></FONT></P><FONT size=2 face=Verdana></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><FONT color=#000000><FONT size=2 face=Verdana> </FONT></FONT></P><FONT size=2 face=Verdana></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT face=Verdana><FONT size=2><STRONG><FONT color=#333333>Cyber Risk Services:</FONT></STRONG><FONT color=#333333> Security, privacy, and operational resilience are critical issues facing both public and private organizations today. Our services help organizations address timely and pervasive issues such as identity theft, data security breaches, data leakage, cyber security, and system outages across organizations of various sizes and industries, with the goal of enabling ongoing, secure, and reliable operations across the enterprise.</FONT></FONT></FONT></P><FONT size=2 face=Verdana></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in Establish productivity goals and develop detailed work plans, schedules, project estimates, and resource and status reports. Review project deliverables to ensure adherence to quality standards. Architect and design master data migration strategies from non SAP procurement systems into SAP Procurement systems using ETL methodology and BODS tool. Oversee the configuration of SAP Ariba Cloud solutions for client upstream and downstream procurement processes. Lead the designing of interfaces using SAP integration toolkit and SAP PI. Manage the designing of SAP FIORI Mobile application. Oversee the designing, prototyping, and configuring of SAP SRM procurement processes and their integration with SAP ECC. Supervise professionals to design and develop SAP procurement process frameworks and approval workflow strategies using SAP Business Rule Framework. Direct unit, integration, and user acceptance testing and preparation of cutover plans. Lead the configuration, prototyping, and integration of SAP supplier interactions tools with client ERP systems involving bid response, order confirmation, invoicing, supplier registration, and catalogs and contract negotiations using SUS, Ariba, EDI, and MDM catalogs.</FONT></FONT></SPAN></P><FONT face=\"Times New Roman\"></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; We offer well-being programs and are continuously looking for new ways to maintain a culture where our people excel and lead healthy, happy lives.  <A href=\"http://www2.deloitte.com/us/en/careers/life-at-deloitte.html?icid=top_life-at-deloitte\" rel=external><FONT color=#0000ff>Learn more about Life at Deloitte.</FONT></A></DIV><DIV><STRONG><FONT color=#3366ff> </FONT></STRONG></DIV><DIV><STRONG><FONT color=#000000>Corporate citizenship</FONT></STRONG></DIV><DIV>Deloitte is led by a purpose: to make an impact that matters. This purpose defines who we are and extends to relationships with our clients, our people and our communities.  We believe that business has the power to inspire and transform. We focus on education, giving, skill-based volunteerism, and leadership to help drive positive social impact in our communities.  <A href=\"http://www2.deloitte.com/us/en/pages/about-deloitte/articles/deloitte-corporate-citizenship.html\" rel=external><FONT color=#0000ff>Learn more about Deloitte’s impact on the world.</FONT></A></DIV><DIV><STRONG> </STRONG></DIV><DIV><STRONG><FONT color=#000000>Recruiter tips</FONT></STRONG></DIV><DIV><FONT color=#000000>We want job seekers exploring opportunities at Deloitte to feel prepared and confident. To help you with your interview, we suggest that you do your research: know some background about the organization and the business area you’re applying to. We also suggest that you brush up on your behavioral and case interviewing skills and practice discussing your experience and job history with a family member, friend, or mentor. </FONT><A href=\"http://www2.deloitte.com/us/en/pages/careers/topics/recruiting-tips.html\" rel=external><FONT color=#0000ff>Check out recruiting tips from Deloitte professionals.</FONT></A></DIV><p>Deloitte is one of the leading professional services organizations in the United States, specializing in audit, tax, consulting, and financial advisory services with clients in more than 20 industries. We provide powerful business solutions to some of the world’s most well-known and respected companies, including more than 75 percent of the Fortune 100.</p><p>At Deloitte, you can have a rewarding career on every level. In addition to challenging and meaningful work, you’ll have the chance to give back to your community, make a positive impact on the environment, participate in a range of diversity and inclusion initiatives, and find the support, coaching, and training it takes to advance your career. Our commitment to individual choice lets you customize aspects of your career path, your educational opportunities and your benefits. mso-bidi-font-family: \"times new roman\"; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold'><FONT color=black>As a Summer Engineer in the Technology Consulting practice, you’ll act as a strategic advisor to clients and assist them in the application, custom development, and management of technology to help enhance their business’ performance.<SPAN style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">  </SPAN>In this role, you’ll also develop implementation go-live support environments, construct transition plans from the project to the support team, and help maintain clients’ applications and technology infrastructure. <o:p></o:p></FONT></SPAN></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><SPAN style='mso-fareast-font-family: \"times new roman\"; You’ll work with technology professionals, gain first-hand exposure on the day-to-day responsibilities and challenges, and develop insights while working on client engagements. Along the way, you will have access to mentoring, counseling, and training opportunities to help foster and accelerate your development of new skills and capabilities.<SPAN style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">  </SPAN><o:p></o:p></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><o:p> </o:p></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><B style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><SPAN style=\"mso-themecolor: text1\"><FONT color=black>The team <o:p></o:p></FONT></SPAN></B></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><SPAN style=\"mso-themecolor: text1\"><FONT color=black>Our US <SPAN style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: bold\">Delivery Center team is comprised of deeply passionate and experienced professionals who guide clients through their most complex technology challenges. {"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30bb0"},"category":"Tax","city":"New York","description":"<P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Deloitte Tax</STRONG><BR>Deloitte Tax LLP helps companies understand national, state and local, and international tax structures and align the tax function with business objectives.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">As an employee of Deloitte Tax, you will work with colleagues worldwide to serve our clients. As you advance in your career, most Deloitte Tax professionals specialize in at least one industry and one group of service offerings. Full-time Deloitte Tax team members will be a part of our mobile workforce which may require travel for extended engagement in another city and/or participating as part of team aligned with another Deloitte Tax service line and/or another Deloitte function-specific subsidiary.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Internship Program</STRONG></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The Deloitte Tax LLP summer internship provides an introduction to tax.  Throughout the program, participants will focus on issues shaping and affecting the profession today as well as topics related to their own career development. Counseling is another aspect of the Internship Program.  At the end of each engagement, interns will have the opportunity to review their performance with management.  Additionally, staff will serve as \"counselors\" to this year's intern group.  Counselors serve as a vital source of information and advice as well as participating in many of the social activities planned for the interns throughout their internship.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Deloitte Tax offers a variety of Service Lines including:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Business Tax Services</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax's Business Tax Services (BTS) professionals understand the intricacies of tax regulations and their relationships to business. In many cases, BTS professionals manage the day-to-day client service relationships-and as such, these professionals serve as the gateway to a variety of specialized Deloitte tax services that can help improve compliance with taxing entities while maintaining each client's overall tax risk profile. Knowledgeable in Federal Tax compliance and planning, BTS professionals work closely with clients and other members of the Deloitte Tax team to understand each organization's global goals and strategies and how industry and economic trends affect the business</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Global Employer Services</STRONG> — Global Employer Services tax professionals help clients develop tax-aligned compensation and benefits programs that address their global and domestic needs. Professionals are comprised of global compensation, benefits, and international assignments practitioners who work with clients to streamline their programs while managing tax effectiveness, risks, and costs. These services are designed to assist clients with developing the strategies, processes, and technologies that affect their staff and operations on a worldwide scale</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">International Tax — Within the area of international tax, the goal of any organization should be to align global effective tax rate reduction and efficient global cash utilization with overall business strategy.  Professionals in the international tax practice help multinational clients integrate tax planning into their overall business strategy and comply with both US and international regulatory requirements. Whether a company is engaged in a merger or acquisition, maintaining compliance with multi-jurisdictional business transactions, or streamlining multi-national supply chain, Deloitte Tax's international tax professionals concentrate efforts on international compliance, research, consulting and planning issues.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Mergers & Acquisitions</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax Merger & Acquisition (M&A) professionals provide corporate and private equity buyers with a broad continuum of advisory services to support mergers, acquisitions, carve-outs, investment and financing structures, disposition alternatives and post-transaction activities.  Working with clients before, during and after the transaction, tax professionals work with clients across corporate functions such as finance, treasury, human resources, operations, information technology and risk management to analyze and evaluate the tax profile and to implement planning designed to help meet each organization's global goals, strategies and business objectives.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Multistate Tax</STRONG> — Multistate taxation is more complex and demanding than ever before. Not only do states and local tax areas have their own unique tax laws, but authorities are more focused on enforcement.  As seasoned professionals in all aspect of multistate tax, Deloitte Tax multistate practitioners help clients manage their state and local tax liability through thorough end-to-end tax approaches, wide-ranging industry and government experience, and deep client commitment.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Private Company Services</STRONG> — Private companies and their owners, and affluent individuals and families all need comprehensive, independent, and objective tax and wealth planning advice.  Professionals in Deloitte Tax Private Company Services work with clients as trusted advisors, helping them to make informed and strategic decisions relevant to their personal financial comfort, business and investment needs, family legacy, and charitable giving - during their lifetime and through estate planning.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Tax Management Advisory Services</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax's Tax Management and Advisory Services (\"TMAS\") group, the largest of its type, sets the standard for comprehensive tax services.  Our professionals provide an integrated approach to process improvement that can help the tax department maximize its strategic value to the organization.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Transfer Pricing</STRONG> — Inter-company transactions are increasing along with government efforts to collect related taxes. Members of the highly specialized Deloitte Tax Transfer Pricing group work to help develop transfer pricing strategies, audit defense, and documentation to cover the spectrum of transfer pricing issues. Through our access to the network of DTT member firms, transfer pricing professionals employ a multi-national and multi-jurisdictional team, utilizing the latest technology and strategies, to help clients work with complex and dynamic issues surrounding transfer pricing needs<BR></P><br><UL><LI><DIV class=BSubheading-Green style=\"PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; We work with clients and help them develop custom software solutions, manage their applications and databases, and provide strategic recommendations to help them optimize their businesses’ operations, processes, and performance. <o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><SPAN style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: bold; mso-themecolor: text1\"><FONT color=black><o:p> </o:p></FONT></SPAN></P><P class=MsoNormal style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><B style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><SPAN lang=EN-GB style=\"mso-fareast-font-family: calibri; mso-ansi-language: en-gb\"><FONT color=black>Deloitte’s culture<o:p></o:p></FONT></SPAN></B></P><P class=MsoNormal style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><SPAN style=\"mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri\">Our positive and supportive culture encourages our people to do their best work every day. We celebrate individuals by recognizing their uniqueness and offering them the flexibility to make daily choices that can help them to be healthy, centered, confident, and aware. We offer well-being programs and are continuously looking for new ways to maintain a culture where our people excel and lead healthy, happy lives.<SPAN style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">  </SPAN></SPAN><A href=\"http://www2.deloitte.com/us/en/careers/life-at-deloitte.html?icid=top_life-at-deloitte\"><SPAN style=\"mso-fareast-font-family: calibri\"><FONT color=blue>Learn more about Life at Deloitte.</FONT></SPAN></A><SPAN style=\"mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri\"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P><P class=MsoNormal style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><B style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><SPAN lang=EN-GB style=\"mso-fareast-font-family: calibri; mso-ansi-language: en-gb\"><FONT color=#3366ff><o:p> </o:p></FONT></SPAN></B></P><P class=MsoNormal style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><B style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><SPAN lang=EN-GB style=\"mso-fareast-font-family: calibri; mso-ansi-language: en-gb\"><FONT color=black>Corporate citizenship<o:p></o:p></FONT></SPAN></B></P><P class=MsoNormal style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><SPAN lang=EN style=\"mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-ansi-language: EN\">Deloitte is led by a purpose: to make an impact that matters. {"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30bbb"},"category":"Tax","city":"Boston","description":"<P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Deloitte Tax</STRONG><BR>Deloitte Tax LLP helps companies understand national, state and local, and international tax structures and align the tax function with business objectives.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">As an employee of Deloitte Tax, you will work with colleagues worldwide to serve our clients. As you advance in your career, most Deloitte Tax professionals specialize in at least one industry and one group of service offerings. Full-time Deloitte Tax team members will be a part of our mobile workforce which may require travel for extended engagement in another city and/or participating as part of team aligned with another Deloitte Tax service line and/or another Deloitte function-specific subsidiary.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Internship Program</STRONG></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The Deloitte Tax LLP summer internship provides an introduction to tax.  Throughout the program, participants will focus on issues shaping and affecting the profession today as well as topics related to their own career development. Counseling is another aspect of the Internship Program.  At the end of each engagement, interns will have the opportunity to review their performance with management.  Additionally, staff will serve as \"counselors\" to this year's intern group.  Counselors serve as a vital source of information and advice as well as participating in many of the social activities planned for the interns throughout their internship.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Deloitte Tax offers a variety of Service Lines including:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Business Tax Services</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax's Business Tax Services (BTS) professionals understand the intricacies of tax regulations and their relationships to business. In many cases, BTS professionals manage the day-to-day client service relationships-and as such, these professionals serve as the gateway to a variety of specialized Deloitte tax services that can help improve compliance with taxing entities while maintaining each client's overall tax risk profile. Knowledgeable in Federal Tax compliance and planning, BTS professionals work closely with clients and other members of the Deloitte Tax team to understand each organization's global goals and strategies and how industry and economic trends affect the business</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Global Employer Services</STRONG> — Global Employer Services tax professionals help clients develop tax-aligned compensation and benefits programs that address their global and domestic needs. Professionals are comprised of global compensation, benefits, and international assignments practitioners who work with clients to streamline their programs while managing tax effectiveness, risks, and costs. These services are designed to assist clients with developing the strategies, processes, and technologies that affect their staff and operations on a worldwide scale</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">International Tax — Within the area of international tax, the goal of any organization should be to align global effective tax rate reduction and efficient global cash utilization with overall business strategy.  Professionals in the international tax practice help multinational clients integrate tax planning into their overall business strategy and comply with both US and international regulatory requirements. Whether a company is engaged in a merger or acquisition, maintaining compliance with multi-jurisdictional business transactions, or streamlining multi-national supply chain, Deloitte Tax's international tax professionals concentrate efforts on international compliance, research, consulting and planning issues.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Mergers & Acquisitions</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax Merger & Acquisition (M&A) professionals provide corporate and private equity buyers with a broad continuum of advisory services to support mergers, acquisitions, carve-outs, investment and financing structures, disposition alternatives and post-transaction activities.  Working with clients before, during and after the transaction, tax professionals work with clients across corporate functions such as finance, treasury, human resources, operations, information technology and risk management to analyze and evaluate the tax profile and to implement planning designed to help meet each organization's global goals, strategies and business objectives.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Multistate Tax</STRONG> — Multistate taxation is more complex and demanding than ever before. Not only do states and local tax areas have their own unique tax laws, but authorities are more focused on enforcement.  As seasoned professionals in all aspect of multistate tax, Deloitte Tax multistate practitioners help clients manage their state and local tax liability through thorough end-to-end tax approaches, wide-ranging industry and government experience, and deep client commitment.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Private Company Services</STRONG> — Private companies and their owners, and affluent individuals and families all need comprehensive, independent, and objective tax and wealth planning advice.  Professionals in Deloitte Tax Private Company Services work with clients as trusted advisors, helping them to make informed and strategic decisions relevant to their personal financial comfort, business and investment needs, family legacy, and charitable giving - during their lifetime and through estate planning.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Tax Management Advisory Services</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax's Tax Management and Advisory Services (\"TMAS\") group, the largest of its type, sets the standard for comprehensive tax services.  Our professionals provide an integrated approach to process improvement that can help the tax department maximize its strategic value to the organization.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Transfer Pricing</STRONG> — Inter-company transactions are increasing along with government efforts to collect related taxes. Members of the highly specialized Deloitte Tax Transfer Pricing group work to help develop transfer pricing strategies, audit defense, and documentation to cover the spectrum of transfer pricing issues. Through our access to the network of DTT member firms, transfer pricing professionals employ a multi-national and multi-jurisdictional team, utilizing the latest technology and strategies, to help clients work with complex and dynamic issues surrounding transfer pricing needs<BR></P><br><UL><LI><DIV class=BSubheading-Green style=\"PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; {"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30bbe"},"category":"Management Consulting","city":"New York","description":"<P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG><FONT size=3 face=Arial>Senior Consultant Emerging Technology Trend Research and Analysis– US Innovation</FONT></STRONG></P><FONT size=2></FONT><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Calibri> </FONT></DIV><FONT size=2></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>A senior consultant on the trend-sensing team in U.S. Innovation identifies, researches, tracks, analyzes, and writes about emerging technology and business trends. </FONT></P><FONT size=2></FONT><DIV><FONT size=2> </FONT></DIV><FONT size=2></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>You will contribute to attention-getting and influential articles for internal and external audiences. Focusing on key segments of the technology sector, you will apply your outstanding research and analysis skills to identify, aggregate, summarize, and analyze information from diverse sources including databases, publications, and industry experts and insiders to distill original insights. Representative topics of focus include cognitive computing, Internet of Things, cloud, cyber risk, data science, and the future of work. </FONT></P><FONT size=2></FONT><DIV><FONT size=2> </FONT></DIV><FONT size=2></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>You will work with colleagues in the U.S. and abroad and be guided by senior staff on the trend-sensing team. This is a key position in a team of highly skilled, tech-trend savvy analysts who hunt for emerging trends and draw out the implications of these trends for our clients and our firm. </FONT></P><FONT size=2></FONT><DIV><FONT size=2> </FONT></DIV><FONT size=2></FONT><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>This team is part of the firm’s U.S. Innovation group, whose charter is to help enable innovation in all of the firm’s businesses. Sensing, understanding, and acting on emerging trends is part of how we do this.</FONT></P><DIV> </DIV><DIV><STRONG>What You’ll Do</STRONG></DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>The senior consultant executes strategies for spotting emerging technology and business trends. You are a champion researcher, obsessively detailed, an analytical thinker, and a graceful communicator. You will work with senior trend experts to help devise compelling hypotheses and conduct research to test those hypotheses, with a particular focus on unearthing information or “signals” others have missed. The team’s mission is to identify and explain trends that are not widely understood but are likely, in the next 18-24 months, to have significant impact on companies across multiple sectors as well as the firm.</FONT></P><FONT size=2></FONT><UL><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Follow and intensively reflect on a wide range of business and technology news and information sources, collect “signals” of emerging trends, compile and track these signals over time, and “connect the dots” to identify potentially important trends</FONT></P></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Structure, organize and synthesize information to develop insights</FONT></P></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Propose ideas for trend articles that will provide valuable insight on emerging trends to clients and Deloitte’s leaders and enhance Deloitte’s reputation for thought leadership and innovation</FONT></P></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Write sections of attention-getting reports/articles targeting an executive audience presenting original insights and findings from research/reporting, analysis and input from colleagues</FONT></P></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Working with marketing teams, promote findings inside and outside the firm</FONT></P></LI></UL><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG></STRONG> </P><DIV><STRONG>How You’ll Grow</STRONG></DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>At Deloitte, we help you shape the future direction of your career. We offer comprehensive development planning as well as training, mentoring, and coaching to help you grow from within.  From hands-on experience to increases in responsibility to rewarding teamwork, Deloitte nurtures talent by providing supportive leadership. </FONT></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><br><DIV><STRONG><FONT size=3>What You’ll Need</FONT></STRONG></DIV><DIV><STRONG><FONT size=2>&nbsp;</FONT></STRONG></DIV><FONT size=2></FONT><UL><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Minimum 5 years of relevant experience, such as technology journalist or industry analyst</FONT></P></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>MBA, MS in a technology field, masters in Journalism, or other relevant advanced degree(s) a plus</FONT></P></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Excellent understanding of key trends and issues in information technology and consumer technology markets plus at least two other industries such as financial services, consumer/industrial products, energy &amp; resources, or public sector</FONT></P></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Passion for emerging technologies and business models</FONT></P></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Expert skills in secondary research, reporting, interviewing; able to identify and use appropriate information sources including general news, industry publications, databases, and industry experts to uncover signals of emerging trends</FONT></P></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Facility with industry and market research concepts such as market size, growth rate, profitability, cost structure, distribution channels, competitive landscape, drivers &amp; inhibitors, etc.</FONT></P></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Strong analytical, problem-solving and critical-thinking skills, ability to derive original insights</FONT></P></LI><LI><DIV><FONT size=2>Strong verbal and written communication skills</FONT></DIV></LI><LI><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>Effective working in geographically distributed teams, highly collaboratively and flexibly</FONT></P></LI><LI><DIV><FONT size=2>Facility in building professional relationships</FONT></DIV></LI><LI><DIV><FONT size=2>Must live in&nbsp;New York City or within commuting distance.&nbsp; Relocation assistance will not be provided for these positions.&nbsp; </FONT></DIV></LI></UL><DIV><STRONG>&nbsp;</STRONG></DIV><DIV><STRONG>The Team</STRONG></DIV><DIV><FONT color=#333333 size=2><FONT face=Calibri>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></FONT></DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT color=#333333 size=2>The US Innovation group focuses on sensing emerging trends and incubating breakthrough technologies and service delivery platforms. This is a critical part of Deloitte’s overall growth strategy.<BR><BR>Sensing entails using technology – the </FONT><A href=\"http://dupress.com/periodical/signals-for-strategists/\" target=_parent><EM><FONT color=#0000ff size=2>sensing platform</FONT></EM></A><FONT color=#333333 size=2> – to identify and monitor signals around emerging developments across all of our priority sectors and key domains including competitive intelligence, regulatory / public policy / legislation, venture investment and enterprise risk management. Furthermore, Sensing involves applying human intelligence – the </FONT><A href=\"http://dupress.com/periodical/signals-for-strategists/\" target=_parent><EM><FONT color=#0000ff size=2>sensing program</FONT></EM></A><FONT color=#333333 size=2> – to assess these signals, develop calls-for-action and identify breakthrough opportunities to support executive decision making.<BR><BR>The US Innovation group also investigates opportunities to commercialize new service delivery platforms. As part of this effort, the US Innovation team develops investment theses, implements proof-of-concepts for new services and identifies new acquisition and partnership opportunities for Deloitte.</FONT></P><FONT size=2></FONT><DIV><STRONG><FONT size=2>&nbsp;</FONT></STRONG></DIV><FONT size=2></FONT><DIV><STRONG><FONT size=3>Benefits</FONT></STRONG></DIV><DIV><STRONG><FONT size=2></FONT></STRONG>&nbsp;</DIV><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><FONT size=2>At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great company. Lead and deliver large, complex client engagements that identify, design, and implement creative business and technology solutions for large companies. Implement and oversee the quality of deliverables and effectively manage the team and day-to-day relationships to ensure exceptional performance. Participate in development and presentation of proposals for business development activities. Lead small engagements or components of large, complex engagements. Develop, maintain, and grow client relationships and lead projects from planning through execution. Lead utilization of financial modeling to conduct analysis and create business cases. Manage leveraging of pharmaceutical and regulatory processes, including Fast track, breakthrough designation, and accelerated approval, to create launch readiness and M&A strategies. Oversee development of comprehensive, competitive intelligence across multiple industries utilizing Gartner, Forrester, Thomson Reuters, BMI and Datamonitor to produce business strategies. Supervise analysis of supply chains using process mapping and gap identification, and recommend process improvements to drive efficiency. Lead employment of project management skills to drive large scale business transformations for clients. Manage improvement of supply chain efficiency utilizing SKU rationalization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits. <A href=\"http://www2.deloitte.com/us/en/pages/careers/articles/life-at-deloitte-benefits-and-rewards.html\" rel=external><FONT color=#0000ff>Learn more about what working at Deloitte can mean for you.</FONT></A> </DIV><DIV><STRONG> </STRONG></DIV><DIV><STRONG><FONT color=#000000>Deloitte’s culture</FONT></STRONG></DIV><DIV>Our positive and supportive culture encourages our people to do their best work every day. We celebrate individuals by recognizing their uniqueness and offering them the flexibility to make daily choices that can help them to be healthy, centered, confident, and aware. As you advance in your career, most Deloitte Tax professionals specialize in at least one industry and one group of service offerings. As a member of Deloitte Tax, you will be a part of our mobile workforce which may require travel for extended engagement in another city and/or participating as part of team aligned with another Deloitte Tax service line and/or another Deloitte function-specific subsidiary.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Deloitte Tax offers a variety of Service Lines including:<BR> <BR></P><P class=CSubheading style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><B>Business Tax Services</B> — Deloitte Tax's Business Tax Services (BTS) professionals understand the intricacies of tax regulations and their relationships to business. In many cases, BTS professionals manage the day-to-day client service relationships-and as such, these professionals serve as the gateway to a variety of specialized Deloitte tax services that can help improve compliance with taxing entities while maintaining each client's overall tax risk profile. Knowledgeable in Federal Tax compliance and planning, BTS professionals work closely with clients and other members of the Deloitte Tax team to understand each organization's global goals and strategies and how industry and economic trends affect the business.<?xml:namespace prefix = \"o\" /><o:p></o:p></P><P class=CSubheading style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> <o:p></o:p></P><P class=CSubheading style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><B>International Tax </B>— Within the area of international tax, the goal of any organization should be to align global effective tax rate reduction and efficient global cash utilization with overall business strategy.  Professionals in the international tax practice help multinational clients integrate tax planning into their overall business strategy and comply with both US and international regulatory requirements. Whether a company is engaged in a merger or acquisition, maintaining compliance<o:p></o:p></P><P class=CSubheading style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">with multi-jurisdictional business transactions, or streamlining multi-national supply chain, Deloitte Tax's international tax professionals concentrate efforts on international compliance, research, consulting and planning issues.<o:p></o:p></P><P class=CSubheading style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> <o:p></o:p></P><P class=CSubheading style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><B>Mergers & Acquisitions </B>— Deloitte Tax Merger & Acquisition (M&A) professionals provide corporate and private equity buyers with a broad continuum of advisory services to support mergers, acquisitions, carve-outs, investment and financing structures, disposition alternatives and post-transaction activities.  Working with clients before, during and after the transaction, tax professionals work with clients across corporate functions such as finance, treasury, human resources, operations, information technology and risk management to analyze and evaluate the tax profile and to implement planning designed to help meet each organization's global goals, strategies and business objectives.<o:p></o:p></P><P class=CSubheading style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> <o:p></o:p></P><P class=CSubheading style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><B>Multistate Tax </B>— Multistate taxation is more complex and demanding than ever before. Not only do states and local tax areas have their own unique tax laws, but authorities are more focused on enforcement.  As seasoned professionals in all aspect of multistate tax, Deloitte Tax multistate practitioners help clients manage their state and local tax liability through thorough end-to-end tax approaches, wide-ranging industry and government experience, and deep client commitment.<o:p></o:p></P><P class=CSubheading style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><o:p> </o:p></P><P class=CSubheading style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: auto; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><B>Washington National Tax</B><SPAN style=\"mso-themecolor: accent3\"><FONT color=#00a1de> </FONT></SPAN>—<SPAN style=\"mso-themecolor: accent3\"><FONT color=#00a1de> </FONT></SPAN>Deloitte Tax’s Washington National Tax (WNT) professionals offer unique insight into the many factors affecting taxation, from the tax policies that drive federal tax legislation, to understanding the technical nuances that may create compliance exposure.  Professionals in the WNT practice are a select group of specialists whose knowledge, skill and experience are integral to understanding technical issues. Deloitte WNT professionals work closely with the local office tax professionals and clients to evaluate complicated issues and help manage risk in today’s increasingly sophisticated business world.</P><br><UL><LI><DIV class=BSubheading-Green style=\"PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold'><FONT color=black> </FONT></SPAN>Common responsibilities will include cleansing and loading data to support data conversion processes, and building interfaces from and to the source applications.<o:p></o:p></FONT></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><SPAN style='mso-fareast-font-family: \"times new roman\"; You’ll not only gain experience in Deloitte’s methodologies, but also gain new skills that are in high demand by our clients.</FONT></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in\"><o:p><FONT face=Calibri> </FONT></o:p></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><B style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><SPAN style=\"mso-themecolor: text1\"><FONT color=black><FONT face=Calibri>The team <o:p></o:p></FONT></FONT></SPAN></B></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style=\"mso-themecolor: text1\"><FONT color=black>Our US <SPAN style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: bold\">Delivery Center team is comprised of deeply passionate and experienced professionals who </SPAN></FONT></SPAN><SPAN style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: bold\">help organizations design, develop, and implement technology-based solutions to optimize their Human Resources practices. Our consultants effectively implement human resource information systems (HRIS) that enhance clients’ long-term productivity and profitability. {"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30bca"},"category":"Tax","city":"Jericho","description":"<P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Deloitte Tax</STRONG><BR>Deloitte Tax LLP helps companies understand national, state and local, and international tax structures and align the tax function with business objectives.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">As an employee of Deloitte Tax, you will work with colleagues worldwide to serve our clients. As you advance in your career, most Deloitte Tax professionals specialize in at least one industry and one group of service offerings. Full-time Deloitte Tax team members will be a part of our mobile workforce which may require travel for extended engagement in another city and/or participating as part of team aligned with another Deloitte Tax service line and/or another Deloitte function-specific subsidiary.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Internship Program</STRONG></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The Deloitte Tax LLP summer internship provides an introduction to tax.  Throughout the program, participants will focus on issues shaping and affecting the profession today as well as topics related to their own career development. Counseling is another aspect of the Internship Program.  At the end of each engagement, interns will have the opportunity to review their performance with management.  Additionally, staff will serve as \"counselors\" to this year's intern group.  Counselors serve as a vital source of information and advice as well as participating in many of the social activities planned for the interns throughout their internship.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Deloitte Tax offers a variety of Service Lines including:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Business Tax Services</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax's Business Tax Services (BTS) professionals understand the intricacies of tax regulations and their relationships to business. In many cases, BTS professionals manage the day-to-day client service relationships-and as such, these professionals serve as the gateway to a variety of specialized Deloitte tax services that can help improve compliance with taxing entities while maintaining each client's overall tax risk profile. Knowledgeable in Federal Tax compliance and planning, BTS professionals work closely with clients and other members of the Deloitte Tax team to understand each organization's global goals and strategies and how industry and economic trends affect the business</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Global Employer Services</STRONG> — Global Employer Services tax professionals help clients develop tax-aligned compensation and benefits programs that address their global and domestic needs. Professionals are comprised of global compensation, benefits, and international assignments practitioners who work with clients to streamline their programs while managing tax effectiveness, risks, and costs. These services are designed to assist clients with developing the strategies, processes, and technologies that affect their staff and operations on a worldwide scale</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">International Tax — Within the area of international tax, the goal of any organization should be to align global effective tax rate reduction and efficient global cash utilization with overall business strategy.  Professionals in the international tax practice help multinational clients integrate tax planning into their overall business strategy and comply with both US and international regulatory requirements. Whether a company is engaged in a merger or acquisition, maintaining compliance with multi-jurisdictional business transactions, or streamlining multi-national supply chain, Deloitte Tax's international tax professionals concentrate efforts on international compliance, research, consulting and planning issues.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Mergers & Acquisitions</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax Merger & Acquisition (M&A) professionals provide corporate and private equity buyers with a broad continuum of advisory services to support mergers, acquisitions, carve-outs, investment and financing structures, disposition alternatives and post-transaction activities.  Working with clients before, during and after the transaction, tax professionals work with clients across corporate functions such as finance, treasury, human resources, operations, information technology and risk management to analyze and evaluate the tax profile and to implement planning designed to help meet each organization's global goals, strategies and business objectives.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Multistate Tax</STRONG> — Multistate taxation is more complex and demanding than ever before. Not only do states and local tax areas have their own unique tax laws, but authorities are more focused on enforcement.  As seasoned professionals in all aspect of multistate tax, Deloitte Tax multistate practitioners help clients manage their state and local tax liability through thorough end-to-end tax approaches, wide-ranging industry and government experience, and deep client commitment.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Private Company Services</STRONG> — Private companies and their owners, and affluent individuals and families all need comprehensive, independent, and objective tax and wealth planning advice.  Professionals in Deloitte Tax Private Company Services work with clients as trusted advisors, helping them to make informed and strategic decisions relevant to their personal financial comfort, business and investment needs, family legacy, and charitable giving - during their lifetime and through estate planning.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Tax Management Advisory Services</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax's Tax Management and Advisory Services (\"TMAS\") group, the largest of its type, sets the standard for comprehensive tax services.  Our professionals provide an integrated approach to process improvement that can help the tax department maximize its strategic value to the organization.<BR> <BR><STRONG>Transfer Pricing</STRONG> — Inter-company transactions are increasing along with government efforts to collect related taxes. Members of the highly specialized Deloitte Tax Transfer Pricing group work to help develop transfer pricing strategies, audit defense, and documentation to cover the spectrum of transfer pricing issues. Through our access to the network of DTT member firms, transfer pricing professionals employ a multi-national and multi-jurisdictional team, utilizing the latest technology and strategies, to help clients work with complex and dynamic issues surrounding transfer pricing needs<BR></P><br><UL><LI><DIV class=BSubheading-Green style=\"PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; We provide powerful business solutions to some of the world’s most well-known and respected companies, including more than 75 percent of the Fortune 100.</p><p>At Deloitte, you can have a rewarding career on every level. In addition to challenging and meaningful work, you’ll have the chance to give back to your community, make a positive impact on the environment, participate in a range of diversity and inclusion initiatives, and find the support, coaching, and training it takes to advance your career. Our commitment to individual choice lets you customize aspects of your career path, your educational opportunities and your benefits. Together with our other delivery centers around the world, we provide development and sustainment services for our clients, both pre- and post- implementation. Here you’ll get the chance to work <SPAN style=\"mso-bidi-font-family: Arial\">with organizations to align their HR systems and processes with their business strategies.<SPAN style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">  </SPAN>Whether developing a refined method for streamlining new- hire onboarding, benchmarking a client’s workforce planning strategies, or configuring and testing a new cloud based HR system, we help our clients adopt new technology systems to manage their people data.<SPAN style=\"BACKGROUND: white\"><FONT color=black> <o:p></o:p></FONT></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><o:p><FONT face=Calibri> </FONT></o:p></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><B style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><FONT face=Calibri>Work you’ll do <o:p></o:p></FONT></B></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><FONT face=Calibri><SPAN style='mso-fareast-font-family: \"times new roman\"; mso-bidi-font-family: \"times new roman\"; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold'><FONT color=black>As a Solution Developer in the Human Capital Consulting HR Transformation practice, you’ll act as a strategic advisor to clients and assist them in the application, custom development, and management of HR technologies to help businesses manage their people data.<SPAN style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">  </SPAN></FONT></SPAN><SPAN style=\"mso-bidi-font-family: Arial\">Whether working with Oracle-Cloud HCM, SAP-SuccessFactors or Workday, you’ll gain hands-on knowledge of how to successfully enable the workplace of the future.</SPAN><SPAN style='mso-fareast-font-family: \"times new roman\"; mso-bidi-font-family: \"times new roman\"; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold'><FONT color=black> Common responsibilities could include requirements gathering, system design, configuration and testing. <SPAN style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\"> </SPAN></FONT></SPAN><SPAN style='mso-fareast-font-family: \"times new roman\"; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold'><FONT color=black>You may also have the opportunity to focus on more strategic HR transformation activities such as </FONT></SPAN><SPAN style='mso-fareast-font-family: \"times new roman\"; mso-bidi-font-family: \"times new roman\"; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold'><FONT color=black>HR process design and optimization, HR shared services design, and HR operating model and organization design to name a few.<SPAN style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">  </SPAN>Common responsibilities may include documenting process flows, managing a business case, and documenting new organization designs.</FONT></SPAN><FONT color=black><o:p></o:p></FONT></FONT></P><P class=MsoNoSpacing style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><SPAN style='mso-fareast-font-family: \"times new roman\"; {"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30bd9"},"category":"Management Consulting","city":"New York","description":"<DIV><DIV><STRONG>Deloitte Digital</STRONG></DIV><DIV>You’ve heard it before:  digital has changed everything.  We’re all more connected, more informed, more interactive.  We have more opportunity, but also more risk.  Brands that want to succeed in this new world need a different kind of partner – one that tears down the traditional model of creative, tech, and business services-in-silo.  That’s what Deloitte Digital is here to do. </DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV>We don’t just apply digital technology. We use it to uncover solutions for the most complex enterprise challenges to transform the customer journey.  Deloitte Digital delivers a unique combination of our firm’s consulting capabilities, industry expertise and trusted methodologies, paired with cutting-edge creative prowess.  Together, we offer the best parts of a creative agency and a strategic IT consultancy. From advanced preconfigured solutions and methodologies, to brand-building and campaign management, Deloitte Digital offers end-to-end solutions that ultimately bring power to the way our clients engage with their customers—wherever they are on their journey. </DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV>We view every project through three lenses: strategy, technology, and creative.  With any project we take on, we know that the value of our client’s brand is in our hands.  They demand solutions that mitigate risk, provide business value, and improve brand engagement.  Deloitte Digital helps clients balance the allure of emerging technologies with the realities of their business, the essence of their brand, and the needs of their customers.</DIV><DIV>This helps us ensure that we deliver beautiful, functional solutions that meet—and exceed—our clients’ needs.</DIV></DIV><DIV><DIV> </DIV><DIV><STRONG><EM>TECHNOLOGY</EM></STRONG></DIV><DIV>Deloitte Consulting's technology professionals help clients identify and solve their most critical information and technological challenges. We provide advisory through end-to-end implementation services as well as outsourcing services and are recognized in the marketplace for capabilities across the spectrum.</DIV><DIV>Our experienced technology professionals offer deep technical experience in their area of focus and are committed to delivering efficient, technology-based solutions to our clients. Our professionals are also aligned to industry sectors. By combining our technical capabilities with our industry experiences, we create unmatched market offerings to solve our clients' business issues. Additionally, we have long-term partnerships with many of the world's leading technology companies, allowing us to understand solution alternatives and recommend and support the most appropriate solution for our clients. By leveraging these elements, we are able to help our clients convert leading edge ideas into tangible results.</DIV>Our professionals are aligned with a technology service line to promote the development of deep technical skills and experiences and improve our ability to tailor solutions to solve our clients' business issues.</DIV><br><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The Senior Consultant leads technical and/or functional delivery threads, develops plans for sections of these threads, and serves as the lead developer and/or technical architect. The Senior Consultant brings considerable technical, functional, and product expertise to deliver effective solutions to clients. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR><STRONG>Essential Functions:</STRONG> <BR>• Sr. Consultants function as integrators between business needs and technology solutions, helping to create technology solutions to meet clients' business needs. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• Responsibilities include, among others, defining systems strategy, developing system requirements, designing and prototyping, testing, training, defining support procedures and implementation. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• Sr. Consultants perform accurate analysis and effective diagnosis of client issues and manage day-to-day client relationships at peer client levels. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• Sr. Consultants gain exposure to multiple industries and service lines within the practice while demonstrating an awareness of the full breadth of services offered by engagement follow-on opportunities. </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR><STRONG>Sr. Consultants are responsible for leading teams within an engagement. <BR>Senior Consultants are required to have:</STRONG> <BR>• 4+ years of relevant technology consulting or industry experience </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• At least 2 years of experience leading Web Content Management (WCM) or Digital Asset Management (DAM) technical design and implementation for business and customer marketing and internally facing solutions </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• At least 2 years of experience with AEM/AdobeCQ, WCM, DAM, and Online Analytics products and technologies </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• At least 1 year of experience leading medium sized teams, including client and consulting staff </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• Experience conceptualizing, designing, building, and deploying Enterprise Content Management solutions </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• Experience analyzing, defining, implementing, and operating Content and Asset Lifecycle Management processes </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• Willingness to travel 80 - 100% of the time </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR><STRONG>In addition, successful Senior Consultants will also have the following preferred background:</STRONG> <BR>• Strong working knowledge of AEM/AdobeCQ/Digital Marketing Suite </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• Java, J2EE, or .Net Development in Web-centric applications </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• JSP and/or ASP.Net development experience </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• Working knowledge of Apache Sling and Java Content Repository (JCR) </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• HTML, JavaScript, and CSS development, preferably with HTML5/CSS3 exposure </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• Design and implementation of Object and Component-oriented solutions </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><BR>• Working knowledge of common software design patterns </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; {"_id":{"$oid":"56b49cf6e4b03e4852e30bda"},"category":"Tax","city":"Austin","description":"<P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Deloitte Tax</STRONG><BR>Deloitte Tax LLP helps companies understand national, state and local, and international tax structures and align the tax function with business objectives.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">As an employee of Deloitte Tax, you will work with colleagues worldwide to serve our clients. As you advance in your career, most Deloitte Tax professionals specialize in at least one industry and one group of service offerings. Full-time Deloitte Tax team members will be a part of our mobile workforce which may require travel for extended engagement in another city and/or participating as part of team aligned with another Deloitte Tax service line and/or another Deloitte function-specific subsidiary.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Internship Program</STRONG></P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">The Deloitte Tax LLP summer internship provides an introduction to tax.  Throughout the program, participants will focus on issues shaping and affecting the profession today as well as topics related to their own career development. Counseling is another aspect of the Internship Program.  At the end of each engagement, interns will have the opportunity to review their performance with management.  Additionally, staff will serve as \"counselors\" to this year's intern group.  Counselors serve as a vital source of information and advice as well as participating in many of the social activities planned for the interns throughout their internship.</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\">Deloitte Tax offers a variety of Service Lines including:</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Business Tax Services</STRONG> — Deloitte Tax's Business Tax Services (BTS) professionals understand the intricacies of tax regulations and their relationships to business. In many cases, BTS professionals manage the day-to-day client service relationships-and as such, these professionals serve as the gateway to a variety of specialized Deloitte tax services that can help improve compliance with taxing entities while maintaining each client's overall tax risk profile. Knowledgeable in Federal Tax compliance and planning, BTS professionals work closely with clients and other members of the Deloitte Tax team to understand each organization's global goals and strategies and how industry and economic trends affect the business</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"> </P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px\"><STRONG>Global Employer Services</STRONG> — Global Employer Services tax professionals help clients develop tax-aligned compensation and benefits programs that address their global and domestic needs. Professionals are comprised of global compensation, benefits, and international assignments practitioners who work with clients to streamline their programs while managing tax effectiveness, risks, and costs. These services are designed to assist clients with developing the strategies, processes, and technologies that affect their staff and operations on a worldwide scale</P><P style=\"MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP
